titleStmt.title: An allarum from Heaven, or, A memento to the great councell, and magistrates of England, now sitting on the seat of justice. By G.W. a cordiall lover of the peace of England.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Texas, Austin Library.
